content: feel free to download my free beanie pattern named after my niece lily just like the beanie she is cute cheeky and full of charm knit in the round bottom up and with a seamed double brim for comfort this beanie has a playful popcorn that adds personality the crown is tapered off neatly using double pointed needles for a flattering shape and snug fit there is a prompt before tapering off to make the beanie longer into more of a slouch style if preferred beanie is made to fit an average adult head materials 12ply bendigo woollen mills wollemi corriedale or classic yarn 78 grams/102metres extra if you opt to make the beanie longer i ve used wollemi limited edition release in paperbark any 12ply/bulky/chunky with similar gauge should be fine 6mm 16 circular needle or preferred method for knitting in the round stitch marker 6mm double pointed needles for decreasing darning needle techniques knit purl knit working yarn with cast on edge to form a double brim popcorn i hope you enjoy my free pattern i would love to see a photo feel free to message me tag my socials or drop me an email facebook/instagram supaknit email supaknit@outlook com
